title: Back To School Skins
body:
1. Back to school Ziggs {{champion:115}} (Midlaner)
Q.His Q  will throw mass of paper
W.His W will throw an Origami on the ground and it will explode after several seconds
E. His E Will throw down thumbtacks
R. His R will throw a big dynamite


2.Back to school Kong Maw{{champion:96}} (Adc)
Q.His Q will throw a pencil out of his mouth
W.His W is the same 
E.His E throw some paper with the vomiting
R.His R will stay the same

3.Back to school Shen{{champion:98}} (Support)
Q.His Q will throw a very sharp pencil 
W.His W still the same
E.His E is the same
R.His R Will teleport normaly but when he is almost there a bunch of papers will introduce him!
 
4.Back to school Rumble {{champion:68}} (Toplaner)
Q.His Flamethrower is made out of school supplies
W.His W is the same 
E.His E throws a lot of penciles stuck with duck tape
R.With his R Empty Apple juice bottles fall from the sky and the terrain is spilled juice!(Yes that was the best I could think of)

5.Back to school Vi{{champion:254}} (Jungler)
Q.Her Q is pretty much the same
W.The mark that her W leaves can be ink!
E.Her E within' the blast there can be thrown some random ''Tests'' That have an F on them
R.Her R is the same
 So That was it.I Hope you approve this I spended like A LOT of time working on this :D

replies.body: This sounds more like a "Pencil" skin line based on your descriptions for all of the updated abilities.  :p
Well What Else :P School is about pencils isnt it :D

You forgot Vel'koz! Complete with schoolgirl skirt for every tentacle and-
*Is suddenly abducted by Riot*
Oh forgive me I forgot that :D
